comp.sql:
SELECT
`student_id`,
 `full_name`,
 `birth_date`,
 `gender`,
 `average_score`
FROM students
WHERE ({{input_search.value?.trim()}} = '' OR (`student_id` LIKE '%{{input_search.value?.trim()}}%' OR `full_name` LIKE '%{{input_search.value?.trim()}}%' OR `gender` LIKE '%{{input_search.value?.trim()}}%'))
LIMIT {{table_data.pageSize}} OFFSET {{table_data.pageOffset}}

SELECT count(`student_id`) AS total_record
FROM students
WHERE ({{input_search.value?.trim()}} = '' OR (`student_id` LIKE '%{{input_search.value?.trim()}}%' OR `full_name` LIKE '%{{input_search.value?.trim()}}%' OR `gender` LIKE '%{{input_search.value?.trim()}}%'))
